text: Tiandi de chuangzao, zhouye de lunliu, li ren hanghai de chuanbo, zhenzhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, jie ta er shi yi si de dadi fusheng, bing zai da dishang sanbu gezhong dongwu, yu fengxiang de gaibian, tiandi jian shouzhi de yun, duiyu neng liaojie de ren kan lai, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
